TowerDefense

Class Destructible

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.GameObject
      • TowerDefense.GameObjectPlus
        • TowerDefense.Destructible
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barricade, Character

    public abstract class Destructible
extends GameObjectPlus
    Destructibles are GameObjects that can be destroyed. This includes Barriers and even things like PEOPLE. Our existence is so fragile. Traits of destructibles are: - health (could be considered durability if you enjoy semantics) - a team (which lets others know whether they WANT to destroy it)
    Author:
    Branden Drake, Rachel Horton

        Parameters:

      • getHealthProportion

        public float getHealthProportion()
        Returns a value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the ratio of current health relative to max possible health.
        Returns:
        The current fraction of health.

      • addHealth

        public void addHealth(float amount)
        Add health to this object. Negative amounts are acceptable (damage). The amount the object's health is adjusted by is itself adjusted by several factors. If there are any effects from receiving damage or dying, this method will call them.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of health to add to this object.

      • isDead

        Returns true if health is at or below the minimum threshold.
